tidbits.title: Caribbean Island Territory
tidbits.description: Puerto Rico is a Caribbean island territory of the United States, known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and tropical climate.

tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Blend
tidbits.description: The island boasts a rich cultural blend of Ta√≠no, African, and Spanish influences, reflected in its music, cuisine, and traditions.

tidbits.title: El Yunque National Forest
tidbits.description: El Yunque, the only tropical rainforest in the U.S. National Forest System, offers lush landscapes, waterfalls, and diverse wildlife.
